body.directions: Read the phrases in Chinese; then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be reasonably completed with the verb presented?
body.answer: 我要_____我的卧室。 Wǒ yào _____ wǒde wòshì.
options: 他哥哥喜欢_____面条。 Tā gēge xǐhuān _____miàntiáo.
我妹妹的床上_____枕头。 Wǒ mèimei de chuáng shàng _____ zhěntóu.
她每天晚上_____书。 Tā měitiān wǎnshàng _____ shū.
body.correct: Job excellently done! 打扫 dǎsǎo means “to clean.” Of the choices, the sentence that can best be completed with this word is 我要打扫我的卧室。 Wǒ yào dǎsǎo wǒde wòshì. I am going to clean my bedroom. It’s less reasonable to “clean” noodles or books.
body.incorrect: Not quite. Review the word again to understand its meaning. Then, place it in the sentences in the choices one-by-one to see which one makes the most sense.

body.quiz: Which of the following appliances is usually used as a pair with the item indicated by the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 烘干机 hōnggānjī
options: Audio for 电扇 diànshàn
Audio for 电视 diànshì
Audio for 炉子 lúzi
body.correct: Fantastic job! 洗衣机 xǐyījī means “washing machine.” The appliance that is usually used with it is 烘干机 hōnggānjī (dryer).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Review the word several more times to identify its meaning, then listen to the audios in the choices to identify their meanings as well. Then, consider which one you most often see with the written word presented.

body.quiz: Based on the meaning of the word presented as well as a previously taught word, 洗碗液 xǐwǎnyè, what do you think the character 液 yè means?
body.correct: Terrific job! 洗衣液 xǐyīyè means “laundry detergent” and 洗碗液 xǐwǎnyè means “dish soap,” both of which are usually in liquid state. The character 液 yè means “liquid.”
body.incorrect: So close! Study the word presented and the reference word, 洗碗液 xǐwǎnyè, to identify their meanings, and then consider what state of matter they are usually in.
